thread.title: MTV VMA Selects DELSEY EMBLEME as the Celebrity Swag Bag
thread.title_full: MTV VMA Selects DELSEY EMBLEME as the Celebrity Swag Bag

title: MTV VMA Selects DELSEY EMBLEME as the Celebrity Swag Bag
text:
September 01, 2015 17:47 ET MTV VMA Selects DELSEY EMBLEME as the Celebrity Swag Bag 
With DELSEY EMBLEME, Everyone Can Rock It Like Beyonce, Bruno Mars and Taylor Swift 
PARIS, FRANCE--(Marketwired - Sep 1, 2015) - DELSEY EMBLEME , set to launch by DELSEY Paris this fall, has been chosen by the MTV Video Music Awards as the celebrity gift bag for this year's event! Soon, everyone will be able to get a little celebrity swag and travel like their favorite artists, with DELSEY EMBLEME . 
Designed with a little Uptown Funk, DELSEY EMBLEME is a hip pick for travelers wanting a resilient, lightweight case. At only 5.5 pounds, and made from BAYER 100% Virgin MakrolonÂ® Polycarbonate, the carry-on leaves plenty of room for personal items while protecting from extreme temperature and impact. 
Easy to organize, the fully lined interior offers two packing compartments with tie-down straps on one side and a zippered divider on the other, while an additional zippered pocket holds delicate items and accessories. 
DELSEY EMBLEME is as smooth as it looks! Four silent double spinner wheels assure superior maneuverability and keep zero weight on arms, so travelers can remain calm and cool. An integrated privacy ID tag underneath the trolley handle is perfect for checked-in or gate-checked bags. A recessed TSA-accepted lock is the final feature for secure travel and peace of mind. 
Available in attractive red or deep blue, DELSEY EMBLEME can coordinate with anything from rock and roll to dance and R&B! The grained texture of the case is scratch resistant and easy to wipe down after each trip, keeping the travel look chic. 
Everyone's favorite artists walked away with a DELSEY EMBLEME bag at the MTV VMAs! And travelers can win their own piece of celebrity swag on the DELSEY USA Facebook page. DELSEY Paris is also throwing in a $50 iTunes gift card. For this contest there is no purchase necessary. The Facebook contest is open to legal residents of the 48 contiguous U.S./D.C. who are 18+. 
Visit www.delsey.com 
About DELSEY: An iconic brand, DELSEY is a French company and a creator of baggage since 1946. For more than 65 years DELSEY has offered consumers cases which bring together quality and audacious design. DELSEY creates ingenious baggage designed to accompany travelers wherever they go and to adapt to all types of journey, both professional and personal. With a strong know-how, the brand is behind numerous innovations recognized by important prizes in the design world. DELSEY combines style and functionality to create products that reflect the personality of each consumer. Today DELSEY is present in all 5 continents and in more than 110 countries. A DELSEY bag is sold every 10 seconds. Contact Information
